name: Escape (itch) (AXaViaN)
description:
You are a slave to an evil man. Finally you have an opportunity to escape. Beat the owner and escape!

**-CONTROLS-**

*Keyboard:*

    WASD: Movement

    I: High Kick
    J: Kick
    K: Punch
    L: Guard

*Controller:*

    Left Stick: Movement

    Y: High Kick
    X: Kick
    A: Punch
    B: Guard

**-INSTRUCTIONS-**

This is a demo scene. When the fight is over, the game resets.

The game is made in 72 hours at #LudumDare44

Click here for the Ludum Dare page.
